DESCRIPTION:

Spending time in search of his missing sister, a girl named Maria discovers he can see ghosts and understand their language. Gradually collecting the crumbs of the facts, it is getting closer and closer to unravel the mystery of the last terrible secret that is somehow connected with the laboratory of Dr. Lindsay Ashford.
